channel.title: Help with the flooder system
channel.description:
ok, im using rune-knight source and i have just got peoples in my server. but everytime some tries to logout they get clost. and then they gets auto ipbanned without an reason.
[img]http://i37.tinypic.com/28m2yih.jpg[/img]
the point is that i want some1 to tell me how to delete the anti-flooder system. i tried in server.java but theres still something more i have to do.

item.title: Help with the flooder system
item.dc:creator: @ownage_milk ownage milk
item.description:
@ownage_milk wrote:

Thats not a ip ban its just someone has either tryed to log in with a diffrent pass too many times which caused flooding, or someone has syiâ€™d your server & it has rejected/banned the host, For players who get this will just need to restart there client. & then they can log back on again.

Read full topic
